name: Nokia World
description:
WASD to move

esc makes the mouse cursor visible

if you ever think you're stuck, hold S to leave any situation

--

i like to think about whats going on inside technology when we arent looking. maybe nothing is happening, just electrical signals pulsing, but then again... maybe theyre all having a dance party. how would i know? what would it even look like in there?

come hang out in nokia land for a minute. talk to some characters before the battery dies and the phone turns off for good. you can take as long as you like.

thank you to Nephasto, TripleAxis and Invector
